Reviews.Title: False Description
Reviews.Author: Vmac03
Reviews.Content: This product was said to be an unlocked blackberry storm 2 with minor scratches. In actuallity the scratches were minor but there were many every where.The clip that keeps the sim card stationary was also missing. But What aggrivated me most was the fact that the item was not unlocked and I had to pay an extra fee to have it done myself. I do not recommend any buyer to purchase anything from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Storm 2
Reviews.Author: Reecha
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone and found far better than Storm. It has many advance feature in comare to previous storm. Its touch screen is amazing super fast. I 've been blackberry fan and just loved this product as well.Phone had a brand logo of TIM. One main problem with this phone is that I am unable to get any way to cancel auto dictionary as due to this I had to spend lot of time correcting what I want to type as instead of suggesting  it just put the auto suggested format. It automatically puts 'ld as current date.Apart from this it is an amazing phone and affordable phone with touch feature.

Reviews.Title: STORM 2 is 9950
Reviews.Author: F. Lee
Reviews.Content: And is WIFI if its NOT a 9950 or had NO wifi it is NOT a STORM 2 and this is false advertising!!storm 1 is the worst with its non stop freezing and constantly having to take the battery out to reset, just disgusting...!!Storm 2 is actually one of the best phones ever when paired with the blackberry playbook it blows any phone or tablet away..., as long as you remember to constantly update it.but storm 1 was a major mistake... and I give RIM credit for coming out with the storm 2, I dont give re-sellers credit for tryin to sell the crappy ass storm 1 as a storm 2.just a heads up from your Uncle Fred!sorry but one star for being so misleading and ignorant on how different the storm 1 is from storm 2 in terms of not freezing every 30 gotdang seconds..

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Martin Casalis
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Very well done, nice details, very good graphical interface and super speed, being a mid-range phone. If I had to buy another, do it again.
